title: GENFI summer meeting 2024
text: This is an informational website for the GENFI summer meeting in 2024 placed in Barcelona.

title: About
text:
Location:
Centre Esther Koplowitz
Esteve Auditorium
c/ Rosselló, 149-153. 08036 Barcelona

How to find us:
Subway: line 5 (blue), ‘Hospital Clínic’ station
Bus: lines 14, 59, 63, 54, 66, 63, 67, 68, 31, 37

title: Accommodation
text:
Hotel Barcelona America
Hotel NH Eixample
Hotel U232

title: Social Event
text: There is a social dinner for June the 13th.
